original_text: So they went into the court to the king, having put the scroll in the chamber of Elishama the secretary, and they reported all the words to the king.
korean_text: 그들이 두루마리를 서기관 엘리사마의 방에 두고 뜰에 들어가 왕께 나아가서 이 모든 말을 왕의 귀에 아뢰니

sentences.original_text: So they went into the court to the king
having put the scroll in the chamber of Elishama the secretary
and they reported all the words to the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 왕에게 모든 말을 보고하였습니다.
